title: Wu Liuqi Zhi Xuanwu Guo Pian (Scissor Seven)
synopsis: In order to protect the residents of Xiaoji Island and the peaceful life here, Wu Liuqi and his partners Dabao and Xiaofei embark on a journey to the Xuanwu Kingdom to find out the truth about his identity and a way to save the island. Waiting for them is more unknowns and adventures.
related_anime: ['Wu Liuqi Zhi Zui Qiang Fa Xing Shi']
characters: ['Wu, Liuqi', 'Bo, Dai', 'Prince of Stan', 'Thirteen', 'Fei, Xiao', 'Chairman Jiang', 'Meow', 'Chicken Farm Boss', 'Ah Jie Pirate']
